personality: Patient and adaptive. Like water, flows around obstacles. Believes in outlasting opponents through superior defense and healing.

fighters.name: Aqua Mind
fighters.personality: Calm and calculating. Never rushes, always plans three moves ahead.
fighters.catchphrase: Flow like water, strike like a tsunami.

attacks.name: Splash
attacks.description: A simple but effective water attack

attacks.name: Tsunami
attacks.description: Massive wave that also heals the user

fighters.name: Frost Guardian
fighters.personality: The tank. Slow but incredibly durable. Protects the team.

attacks.name: Ice Shield
attacks.description: Defensive ice barrier that reduces next damage

fighters.name: Tide Dancer
fighters.personality: Graceful and evasive. Dances around attacks while striking back.
fighters.catchphrase: Can't hit what you can't catch!
